Package natlang.rdg.discourse

Class Summary
CueWordHistory CueWordHistory keeps track of the last five cue words that were used, to prevent monotone text
DiscourseHistory A history containing all plot elements mentioned sofar Is used to detect repetition, add discourse markers and repeat information if a certain entity has not been mentioned for a long time
Entity An entity object contains all information necessary for the Referring Expression Generator: the unique name, concept, gender, which nouns have been used to lexicalize the entity, whether it is the first reference to the entity in the current paragraph, its salience value, the number of pronouns used in a row, the number of sentences ago that the entity was mentioned, the part of speech, and whether it has already been the head of a phrase in the current sentence
EntityHistory A history containing the entities and salience values, used by the REG
History Really simple history, only containing the names of the entities Used in the Document Planner to decide whether background information and names should be added
RuleHistory RuleHistory keeps track of the last few grammatical rules that were used to order a dependency tree, to prevent monotone sentences.
